Thank you, everyone!

The 2nd Annual SF Street Food Fes­ti­val was a huge success!
Thank you to all who attended the Festival.

Silent Auction

La Cocina is incredibly excited to announce the return of our online experiential silent auction!
We love doing these kind of things, and know that you do too.  Our silent auction is an opportunity for you, a group of your friends or family to have a once-in-a-lifetime experience with some of the best chefs and locations [...]

After Party

There ain’t no party like a Street Food party, because a Street Food party don’t stop!
Join us for the After Party at Cafe Cocomo, for a night of sick jams, dancing, and (of course!) street food.  Presale tickets are now available, so buy them here!
